title: Exploring Cape Breton (Premium)
description:

Exploring Cape Breton
Tonight, we return to Nova Scotia and pick up where we left off in Monday's episode. The promise of pleasant adventure awaits as we head to the island of Cape Breton at the northern tip of the Maritime province. ğŸ˜´Â 
Sound design: distant ocean waves.Â 
Narrator: Thomas Jones

itunes:title: Exploring Cape Breton (Premium)
itunes:author: Slumber Studios
itunes:subtitle: Narrated by Thomas Jones. We continue our restful journey through Nova Scotia with a day trip to Cape Breton and go whale-watching at sunset.
